bibl.title: with assistance from B.P. Grenfell, E. Lobel and M. Rostovtzeff, The Tebtunis Papyri. Volume III, Part 1.

series.title: University of California Publications. Graeco-Roman Archaeology.

bibl.seg: Hunt Arthur S. and J. Gilbart Smyly, with assistance from B.P. Grenfell, E. Lobel and M. Rostovtzeff, The Tebtunis Papyri. Volume III, Part 1. (University of California Publications. Graeco-Roman Archaeology. III.)
London, H. Milford, 1933, 4°, xix-333 pp. et 7 pll.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, CR 48 (1934) pp. 87-88. - Heinz Kortenbeutel, GGA 197 (1935) pp. 227-232. - J.G. Milne, JHS 53 (1933) pp. 318-319. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 9 (1934) No. 17, pp. 136-138. - Augusto Rostagni, RivFil 11 (1933) pp. 526-528. - Karl Fr.W. Schmidt, PhilWoch 54 (1934) coll. 1302-1319. - Fr. Smolka, Kwartalnik Klasyczny 8 (1934) pp. 229-235. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 11 (1933) pp. 146-152.
